HotelRoom.Inclusion: Free High-Speed Internet,Free breakfast,Free WiFi Free breakfast

RoomAdditionalInfo.Description:
129-sq-foot room with city views


Internet - Free WiFi and wired Internet access

Entertainment - 36-inch flat-screen TV with premium channels and pay movies

Food and Drink - Coffee/tea maker, minibar, 24-hour room service, and free bottled water

Sleep - Premium bedding, blackout drapes/curtains, and bed sheets

Bathroom - Private bathroom, shower, bathrobes, and slippers

Practical - Safe, phone, and wardrobe or closet; free cribs/infant beds available on request

Comfort - Climate-controlled air conditioning and daily housekeeping

Accessibility - Raised toilet seat, wheelchair accessible, grab bar near toilet, and low-height counter and sink

Non-Smoking
